summary: This modification adds a new sword with a unique scabbard and detailed textures to Skyrim. The sword is craftable (Elven Smithing) and improvable at any blacksmith. It is also placed at a special place in Tamriel.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i893.photobucket.com/albums/ac140/Skillyntic/BladeOfEplear.png[/IMG]
version 1.53
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31247#]click here for the German Translation[/url]
[IMG]http://i893.photobucket.com/albums/ac140/Skillyntic/Modifications_KingEplear_Introduction.png[/IMG]
\"Blade of Eplear\" adds a new sword with a unique scabbard and detailed textures to Skyrim. The sword is craftable (Elven Smithing) and improvable at any blacksmith. If you don\'t want to craft it, skip to \"Location\".



[youtube]R5WNMNxkeBY[/youtube]

[size=5][b]I am still working on a \'Bosmer Weapons\'-mod which will introduce a whole bosmer weapon set to the game.[/b][/size]

[IMG]http://i893.photobucket.com/albums/ac140/Skillyntic/Modifications_KingEplear_Statistics.png[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i893.photobucket.com/albums/ac140/Skillyntic/Statistic.png[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i893.photobucket.com/albums/ac140/Skillyntic/Modifications_KingEplear_Changelog.png[/IMG]
Version 1.53
    material edited 

Version 1.52
    both swords are unique now (not leveled)
    Aevril idle animations optimized

Version 1.51
    two handed version smithing fix
    two handed version inventory fix
    material improved

Version 1.5
    two handed version added
    retextured
    smithing recipes improved 

Version 1.0
    inventory image resized
    statistic balanced 

Version 0.99
    location added
    mapmarker added 

Version 0.921
    meshes path fixed
    textures path fixed
    smithing perk fixed
    statistics (damage, weight, value, etc) adjusted 



[IMG]http://i893.photobucket.com/albums/ac140/Skillyntic/Location.png[/IMG]
Go to Falkreath. Now take the south western path, which leads then to the northwest.
Follow this route until you are between the Lake Klinalth and some small mountains.
Now take the eastern path until you see something like a treehouse.
There will be a NPC with the name Aevril and he gots the sword equiped.

Attention! Aevril is an aggressive level 35 NPC!

If this instruction isn\'t understandable, look at the Location image above.

[IMG]http://i893.photobucket.com/albums/ac140/Skillyntic/Modifications_KingEplear_Team.png[/IMG]
All Credit goes to CentificGrafics aka. Rafael Hayduk

Special thanks to:
-ProJECTz3 for german translation
-Eriko for russian translation
-Moorelf for french translation
-Azarian for czech translation
-SaioTV for the great review/feature


If you got any bugs, please send me a detailed bug report e-mail to \"centificgrafics@web.de\".

Feel free to give improvement suggestions in the comment window.

Don\'t forget to endorse me!!! :)

Â©Copyrights 2012 CentificGrafics, Germany
